sentences.en: Astronomers can calculate when there will be eclipses of the sun and moon.
sentences.cn: 天文学家可以算出何时发生日食和月食.

sentences.en: Emotional people don't stop to calculate.
sentences.cn: 感情容易冲动的人做事往往不加考虑.

sentences.en: Engineers calculate the strains and stresses of a bridge.
sentences.cn: 工程师们计算桥梁的受压力度.

sentences.en: Engineers calculate the strains and stresses on a bridge.
sentences.cn: 工程师们计算桥梁的应变和应力.

sentences.en: From this you can calculate the total mass in the Galaxy.
sentences.cn: 由此你可以算出银河系的总质量。

sentences.en: He must calculate the probability of failure.
sentences.cn: 他必须计算一下失败的概率.

sentences.en: I calculate we'll be in time.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们是来得及的

sentences.en: I'll calculate what it will cost.
sentences.cn: 我要估计一下那要花多少钱.

sentences.en: Our main aim is to calculate the number of distinct patterns.
sentences.cn: 我们的主要目的是计算不同的型的数目.

sentences.en: Researchers calculated that this group was at a higher risk of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 研究人员估测这一群体患心脏病的机率更高。

sentences.en: Take a hundred and twenty values and calculate the mean.
The project is on such a gigantic scale that the cost is hard to calculate.

sentences.cn: 这些仪器计算距离非常精确。

sentences.en: This formula is used to calculate the area of a circle.
sentences.cn: 这个公式用于计算圆的面积。

sentences.en: Use the formula to calculate the volume of the container.
sentences.cn: 用公式计算容器的容积。

sentences.en: We calculate that the average size farm in Lancaster County is 65 acres.
sentences.cn: 我们计算出兰开斯特郡的农场面积平均为65英亩。

sentences.en: We must calculate on a long - term basis.
sentences.cn: 我们要作 长期 打算.

words.tran_cn: 可计算的；能预测的；可靠的
计算出的；适合的；有计划的
计算的；深谋远虑的；审慎的
计算的，善于计算的；精明的
计算；估计；计算的结果；深思熟虑
计算；估计；打算（calculate的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 适合于……；为适合…而设计的

trans.tran_en: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers

trans.tran_cn: 计算， 核算； 推测， 估计； 打算， 计划
trans.tran_en: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers
